name: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marina Las Condes

reviews.text: The hotel decor is a minimalist style that includes a modernistic design that comes across as stark and severe. The result are rooms that are quite plain and not designed for comfort. The desk chair is made of a metal mesh with small vinyl cushion that is not conducive to long work sessions. The bed was not particularly comfortable and in my week at the BW Premier, I never felt rested or relaxed.
reviews.title: Modern but Stark

reviews.text: Hotel staff were quite helpful, both at the front desk and in housekeeping services. The front desk staff were quite forthcoming with recommendations for restaurants, shopping, etc. Hotel restaurant staff seemed to do their best to ignore any prospective diner who entered their door. There is free Internet service at the hotel that was quite reliable and worked at a reasonably good speed.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel - clean, reasonably priced, great location

reviews.text: The biggest shortcoming of the BW Premier is its restaurant. Rarely have I ever experienced a hotel restaurant this bad. Although breakfast was included in my rate, it was usually inedible or allowed to run so low that food wasn't available. One morning, I had to scrape a hard crust of scrambled eggs from the bottom of the chafing dish, while most other mornings, the scrambled eggs resembled a yellow soupy mess with small clumps floating around in it. On more than one occasion, I bypassed the soupy eggs to get cereal, only to find that the milk dispenser was empty. It was usually difficult to find a place to sit, not because the restaurant was crowded, but because all of the tables were dirty from previous diners. I tried dinner a couple of times and left most of the food on my plate, since it was just that bad. For a good meal, I would recommend Chilenazo, a barbeque restaurant that is about a ten minute walk from the hotel.
reviews.title: Sparkling, contemporary hotel... very nice choice for quieter area in Santiago

reviews.text: I stayed here for a week for a large number of colleagues. The price and location (near subway) are excellent. The food quality is decent, not great. The rooms are clean and comfortable, and the staff is friendly.
reviews.title: Beautiful...DON'T STAY HERE

aka: Best Western Premier Marina Las Condes Hotel Las Condes
description: Welcome to BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marina Las Condes! Discover the BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marina Las Condes located in a new and sophisticated area in Las Condes, beside the Andes mountains. We are your best option in the modern city of Santiago, Chile. Our hotel is an upscale property, completely designed and built on last 2010, with 151 rooms, including four junior suites, a lounge bar, a restaurant, meeting rooms, a pool, and a gym.
